summary.span: 表示存储在 Oracle 服务器上的大型对象二进制 () 数据类型。

span.span: Represents a large object binary () data type stored on an Oracle server.

summary.span: 将数据从指定的 追加到当前 。

span.span: Appends data from the specified to the current .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要写入 `LOB` ，您必须 `LOB` 使用 SQL SELECT 语句中的 FOR UPDATE 子句检索到，并且必须已启动本地事务。To write to the `LOB`, you must have retrieved the `LOB` using the FOR UPDATE clause in the SQL SELECT statement, and you must have a local transaction started. 源中的所有数据 `LOB` 都追加到当前的末尾 `LOB` 。All data from the source `LOB` is appended to the end of the current `LOB`. 在 `LOB` 此过程中，不会计算或更改的位置。The position of neither `LOB` is evaluated or changed during this process. 基础数据类型必须始终相同。The underlying data types must always be the same. 例如，如果要从中追加 ，则目标 也必须是 。For example, if you are appending from an , the destination must also be an . > [!NOTE] > 在此版本中，对只读执行的写入操作 `LOB` 可能会成功，但不会更新 `LOB` 服务器上的。In this release, a write operation to a read-only `LOB` might succeed, but does not update the `LOB` on the server. 但在这种情况下，将更新的本地副本 `LOB` 。In this case, however, the local copy of the `LOB` is updated. 因此，以后对对象的读取操作 可能会返回写入操作的结果。Therefore, later read operations on the object might return the results of the write operation.

span.span: The source is null.

exception.span: 源 为 null，或者连接已关闭。

span.span: The source is null, or the connection is closed.

exception.span: 源 对象已关闭或已释放。

span.span: The source object was closed or disposed.
An Oracle error has occurred.

summary.span: 在执行多个写操作时避免服务器端触发器激发。

span.span: Prevents server-side triggers from firing while performing multiple write operations.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void BeginBatch() cil managed

summary.span: 在执行多个读操作时避免服务器端触发器激发。

span.span: Prevents server-side triggers from firing while performing multiple read operations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `LOB`在模式中打开 ; 因此，只能在对的 `LOB` 相应调用之前从中读取，而不能写入 。Opens the `LOB` in mode; therefore, the `LOB` can only be read from, not written to, until the corresponding call to . 若要对执行批处理写入 `LOB` ，请 调用 。To perform batch writes to the `LOB`, call with . 在 同一事务中多次调用的时间当前会引发 Oracle "tnsnames.ora-22293： LOB 已在同一事务中打开" 错误。Calling more than one time within the same transaction currently throws the Oracle "ORA-22293: LOB already opened in the same transaction" error. 此外，如果您 `LOB` 使用另一个获取 ，而原始调用方未调用 方法，则会生成相同的错误。In addition, if you obtain the `LOB` using another , and the original caller has not called the method, the same error is generated. 因此，在使用完后，必须调用 方法 。Therefore, you must call the method when you are finished using the .

span.span: The connection is closed.
The object was closed or disposed.
An Oracle error has occurred.

summary.span: 在以指定的访问模式执行多个读写操作时避免服务器端触发器激发。

span.span: Prevents server-side triggers from firing while performing multiple read and write operations in the specified access mode.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要写入 `LOB` ，您必须 `LOB` 使用 SQL SELECT 语句中的 FOR UPDATE 子句检索到，并且必须已启动本地事务。To write to the `LOB`, you must have retrieved the `LOB` using the FOR UPDATE clause in the SQL SELECT statement, and you must have a local transaction started. 在 同一事务中多次调用的时间当前会引发 Oracle "tnsnames.ora-22293： LOB 已在同一事务中打开" 错误。Calling more than one time within the same transaction currently throws the Oracle "ORA-22293: LOB already opened in the same transaction" error. 此外，如果您 `LOB` 使用另一个获取 ，而原始调用方未调用 方法，则会生成相同的错误。In addition, if you obtain the `LOB` using another , and the original caller has not called the method, the same error is generated. 因此，在使用完后，必须调用 方法 。Therefore, you must call the method when you are finished using the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要写入 `LOB` ，您必须 `LOB` 使用 SQL SELECT 语句中的 FOR UPDATE 子句检索到，并且必须已启动本地事务。To write to the `LOB`, you must have retrieved the `LOB` using the FOR UPDATE clause in the SQL SELECT statement, and you must have started a local transaction.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ChunkSize As Integer
public: property int ChunkSize { int get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示读/写操作过程中要从服务器检索或发送到服务器的最小字节数。

span.span: Gets a value indicating the minimum number of bytes to retrieve from or send to the server during a read/write operation.

value.span: 要检索或发送的最小字节数。

span.span: The minimum number of bytes to retrieve or send.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性返回的值 不是用于 Oracle 的 .NET Framework 数据提供程序的设置。The value returned by the property is not a setting of the .NET Framework Data Provider for Oracle. 相反，它是与服务器进行通信时，Oracle 调用接口 (OCI) 使用的值。Instead, it is the value that the Oracle Call Interface (OCI) uses when communicating with the server. 用于 确保客户端区块的大小相同。Use to ensure that client-side chunks are the same size. 在较小的块中读取或写入不会缓存数据，并会导致对服务器的不太优化的往返，因为不会接收或发送完整的数据包。Reading or writing in smaller chunks does not cache data, and causes a less-optimized round trip to the server, because a full packet is not received or sent.

abstract member Clone : unit -> obj override this.Clone : unit -> obj

summary.span: 创建一个新 对象，该对象与原始 对象引用相同的 Oracle 。

span.span: Creates a new object that references the same Oracle as the original object.

returns.span: 一个与原始 对象引用相同 Oracle 的新 对象。

span.span: A new object that references the same Oracle as the original object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 新对象的属性 最初具有与原始对象相同的值。The properties of the new object initially have the same values as those of the original object. 但是，在 完成后，每个 对象都相互独立。However, after the is complete, each object is independent from the other. 例如，更改原始属性的值不 会更改副本上的的值 。For example, changing the value of the property on the original does not change the value of on the copy.

The object was closed or disposed.

param.name: destination
param.span: 目标 。

span.span: The destination .

summary.span: 从该 复制到目标 。

span.span: Copies from this to a destination .
The number of bytes copied.

returns.span: 这排除了所有已填充的字节。

span.span: This excludes any padded bytes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 基础数据类型必须始终相同。The underlying data types must always be the same. 例如，如果从复制 ，则目标 也必须是 。For example, if you are copying from an , the destination must also be an . 如果目标偏移超出了目标的末尾，则 `LOB` `LOB` 会扩展数据要复制到的。If the destination offset is beyond the end of destination `LOB`, the `LOB` to which the data is being copied is extended. 与结尾之间的 `LOB` 和目标偏移量之间的空格将用零填充 `BLOB` 数据类型，为 `CLOB` 和 `NCLOB` 数据类型填充空格。The space between the end of the `LOB` and the destination offset beyond the end is padded with zeros for `BLOB` data types and spaces for `CLOB` and `NCLOB` data types. 若要写入 `LOB` ，您必须 `LOB` 使用 SQL SELECT 语句中的 FOR UPDATE 子句检索到，并且必须已启动本地事务。To write to the `LOB`, you must have retrieved the `LOB` using the FOR UPDATE clause in the SQL SELECT statement, and you must have a local transaction started. > [!NOTE] > 在此版本中，对只读执行的写入操作 `LOB` 可能会成功，但不会更新 `LOB` 服务器上的。In this release, a write operation to a read-only `LOB` might succeed, but not update the `LOB` on the server. 但在这种情况下，将更新的本地副本 `LOB` 。In this case, however, the local copy of the `LOB` will be updated. 因此，以后对对象的读取操作 可能会返回写入操作的结果。Therefore, later read operations on the object might return the results of the write operation. > > 此 `CopyTo` 方法不会 `OracleLob` 在执行复制操作前清除目标的内容。The `CopyTo` method does not clear the contents of the destination `OracleLob` before performing the copy operation.

exception.span: 参数中指定的 为 null。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 基础数据类型必须始终相同。The underlying data types must always be the same. 例如，如果从复制 ，则目标 也必须是 。For example, if you are copying from an , the destination must also be an . 如果目标偏移超出了目标的末尾，则 `LOB` `LOB` 会扩展数据要复制到的。If the destination offset is beyond the end of destination `LOB`, the `LOB` to which the data is being copied is extended. `LOB`对于 `BLOB` 数据类型，和 `CLOB` 数据类型的空格，将用零填充结束和目标偏移量之间的空格 `NCLOB` 。The space between the end of `LOB` and destination offset beyond the end is padded with zeros for `BLOB` data types and spaces for `CLOB` and `NCLOB` data types. 若要写入 `LOB` ，您必须 `LOB` 使用 SQL SELECT 语句中的 FOR UPDATE 子句检索到，并且必须已启动本地事务。To write to the `LOB`, you must have retrieved the `LOB` using the FOR UPDATE clause in the SQL SELECT statement, and you must have a local transaction started. > [!NOTE] > 在此版本中，对只读执行的写入操作 `LOB` 可能会成功，但不会更新 `LOB` 服务器上的。In this release, a write operation to a read-only `LOB` might succeed, but does not update the `LOB` on the server. 但在这种情况下，将更新的本地副本 `LOB` 。In this case, however, the local copy of the `LOB` is updated. 因此，以后对对象的读取操作 可能会返回写入操作的结果。Therefore, later read operations on the object might return the results of the write operation. > > 此 `CopyTo` 方法不会 `OracleLob` 在执行复制操作前清除目标的内容。The `CopyTo` method does not clear the contents of the destination `OracleLob` before performing the copy operation.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance int64 Erase() cil managed

summary.span: 从该 清除所有数据。

span.span: Erases all data from this .
The number of bytes erased.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不截断数据。 does not truncate data. `LOB`数据类型的长度保持不变 `BLOB` ，已清除的数据将替换为0x00。The `LOB` length remains the same for a `BLOB` data type, and the erased data is replaced by 0x00. `CLOB` 和 `NCLOB` 数据类型替换为空格。`CLOB` and `NCLOB` data types are replaced by spaces. 若要写入 `LOB` ，您必须 `LOB` 使用 SQL SELECT 语句中的 FOR UPDATE 子句检索到，并且必须已启动本地事务。To write to the `LOB`, you must have retrieved the `LOB` using the FOR UPDATE clause in the SQL SELECT statement, and you must have a local transaction started. > [!NOTE] > 在此版本中，对只读执行的写入操作 `LOB` 可能会成功，但不会更新 `LOB` 服务器上的。In this release, a write operation to a read-only `LOB` might succeed, but does not update the `LOB` on the server. 但在这种情况下，将更新的本地副本 `LOB` 。In this case, however, the local copy of the `LOB` is updated. 因此，以后对对象的读取操作 可能会返回写入操作的结果。Therefore, later read operations on the object might return the results of the write operation.

The number of bytes erased.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 和参数中的值的 `offset` 和 `amount` 可以大于的大小的总和 。The sum of the values in the `offset` and `amount` parameters can be greater than that of the size of the . 因此，如果指定的值大于属性返回的值， 则会成功，但只会 擦除到的末尾 。Therefore, specifying a value greater than that returned by the property succeeds; however only erases to the end of the . 同样，如果将负值传递到 `offset` ， 将会成功，但只从开始开始清除 。 ) 此行为与和方法的行为不同 ，并提供了能够从指定值中删除所有数据的优点， `offset` 而不会对服务器进行额外的往返以验证实际大小。 ((Similarly, if a negative value is passed to `offset`, will succeed, but only erase starting from the beginning of the .) This behavior is different from that of the and methods, and offers the advantage of being able to erase all data from the value specified by `offset` without making an additional roundtrip to the server to verify the actual size. 不截断数据。 does not truncate data. `LOB`数据类型的长度保持不变 `BLOB` ，已清除的数据将替换为0x00。The `LOB` length remains the same for a `BLOB` data type, and the erased data is replaced by 0x00. `CLOB` 和 `NCLOB` 数据类型替换为空格。`CLOB` and `NCLOB` data types are replaced by spaces. 若要写入 `LOB` ，您必须 `LOB` 使用 SQL SELECT 语句中的 FOR UPDATE 子句检索到，并且必须已启动本地事务。To write to the `LOB`, you must have retrieved the `LOB` using the FOR UPDATE clause in the SQL SELECT statement, and you must have a local transaction started. > [!NOTE] > 在此版本中，对只读执行的写入操作 `LOB` 可能会成功，但不会更新 `LOB` 服务器上的。In this release, a write operation to a read-only `LOB` might succeed, but does not update the `LOB` on the server. 但在这种情况下，将更新的本地副本 `LOB` 。In this case, however, the local copy of the `LOB` is updated. 因此，以后对对象的读取操作 可能会返回写入操作的结果。Therefore, later read operations on the object might return the results of the write operation.

exception.span: 该操作未处在事务中， 对象为 null，或者连接已关闭。

span.span: The operation is not within a transaction, the object is null, or the connection is closed.

summary.span: 表示一个 null 对象。

span.span: Represents a null object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以 使用以下格式构造一个为 NULL 的：You can construct an that is NULL using this format: ``` OracleLob myLob = OracleLOB.Null; ``` 此方法主要用于测试 `LOB` 从服务器返回的是否为 NULL，如本示例所示：This technique is used primarily to test whether a `LOB` returned from the server is NULL, as this example illustrates: ``` If(myLob == OracleLob.Null) ``` NULL 的 `LOB` 行为类似于中的零字节 `LOB` ， 并将始终返回零字节。A NULL `LOB` behaves similarly to a zero byte `LOB` in that succeeds and always returns zero bytes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 流必须支持查找以获取或设置位置。The stream must support seeking to get or set the position. 使用 属性来确定流是否支持查找。Use the property to determine whether the stream supports seeking. 支持查找超出流长度的任何位置。Seeking to any location beyond the length of the stream is supported. `CLOB`还支持对和数据类型查找奇数位置 `NCLOB` 。Seeking to an odd position for `CLOB` and `NCLOB` data types is also supported. 有关详细信息，请参阅属性的 "备注" 部分 。For more information, see the Remarks section of the property. 属性不跟踪流中已使用的、跳过的或两个字节的字节数。The property does not keep track of the number of bytes from the stream that have been consumed, skipped, or both.

Public Overrides Function Seek (offset As Long, origin As SeekOrigin) As Long
public: override long Seek(long offset, System::IO::SeekOrigin origin);

param.name: offset
param.span: 相对于 origin 的字节偏移量。

span.span: A byte offset relative to origin.

param.span: 如果 为负，则新位置位于 指定的位置之前 指定的字节数。

span.span: If is negative, the new position precedes the position specified by by the number of bytes specified by .

param.span: 如果 为零，则新位置是 指定的位置。

span.span: If is zero, the new position is the position specified by .

param.span: 如果 为正，则新位置位于 指定的位置之后 指定的字节数。

span.span: If is positive, the new position follows the position specified by by the number of bytes specified by .

param.name: origin
param.span: 类型的值，指示用于获取新位置的参考点。

span.span: A value of type indicating the reference point used to obtain the new position.

summary.span: 在当前 流上设置位置。

span.span: Sets the position on the current stream.
The new position within the current stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 `offset` 为负，则新位置必须在由指定的位置之前 `origin` `offset` 。If `offset` is negative, the new position must precede the position specified by `origin` by the number of bytes specified by `offset`. 如果 `offset` 为零，则新位置必须是指定的位置 `origin` 。If `offset` is zero, the new position must be the position specified by `origin`. 如果 `offset` 为正，则新位置必须在由指定的位置之后的位置 `origin` `offset` 。If `offset` is positive, the new position must follow the position specified by `origin` by the number of bytes specified by `offset`. 支持查找超出流长度的任何位置。Seeking to any location beyond the length of the stream is supported. `CLOB`还支持对和数据类型查找奇数位置 `NCLOB` 。Seeking to an odd position for `CLOB` and `NCLOB` data types is also supported. 有关详细信息，请参阅属性的 "备注" 部分 。For more information, see the Remarks section of the property.

span.span: The parameter does not contain a valid value.

exception.span: 结果位置在值的长度之外。

span.span: The resulting position is beyond the length of the value.
The object was closed or disposed.
An Oracle error has occurred.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void SetLength(int64 value) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub SetLength (value As Long)

param.name: value
param.span: 所需的当前 流的长度（以字节表示）。

span.span: The desired length of the current stream in bytes.

param.span: 对于 和 数据类型，它必须为偶数。

span.span: For and data types, this must be an even number.

summary.span: 将 流的长度设置为小于当前长度的值。

span.span: Sets the length of the stream to a value less than the current length.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 尝试增加流的长度 失败，并返回 Oracle 服务器的 "Message： tnsnames.ora-22926：指定的剪裁长度大于当前 LOB 值的长度"。An attempt to increase the length of the stream fails, and returns "Message: ORA-22926: specified trim length is greater than current LOB value's length" from the Oracle server. 流必须支持写入和查找， 才能正常工作。A stream must support both writing and seeking for to function. 用于 Oracle 的 .NET Framework 数据提供程序 `CLOB` `NCLOB` 以 Unicode 形式处理所有和数据。The .NET Framework Data Provider for Oracle handles all `CLOB` and `NCLOB` data as Unicode. 因此，在访问 `CLOB` 和 `NCLOB` 数据类型时，始终会处理字节数，其中每个字符为2个字节。Therefore, when accessing `CLOB` and `NCLOB` data types, you are always dealing with the number of bytes, where each character is 2 bytes. 例如，如果一串包含三个字符的文本 `NCLOB` 在 Oracle 服务器上另存为，其中字符集为每个字符4个字节，并且你执行 `SetLength` 操作，则可以将该字符串的长度指定为6个字节，尽管它在服务器上存储为12个字节。For example, if a string of text containing three characters is saved as an `NCLOB` on an Oracle server where the character set is 4 bytes per character, and you perform a `SetLength` operation, you specify the length of the string as 6 bytes, although it is stored as 12 bytes on the server. 若要写入 `LOB` ，您必须 `LOB` 使用 SQL SELECT 语句中的 FOR UPDATE 子句检索到，并且必须已启动本地事务。To write to the `LOB`, you must have retrieved the `LOB` using the FOR UPDATE clause in the SQL SELECT statement, and you must have a local transaction started. > [!NOTE] > 对只读的写入操作 `LOB` 可能会成功，但不会更新 `LOB` 服务器上的。A write operation to a read-only `LOB` might succeed, but does not update the `LOB` on the server. 但在这种情况下，将更新的本地副本 `LOB` 。In this case, however, the local copy of the `LOB` is updated. 因此，以后对对象的读取操作 可能会返回写入操作的结果。Therefore, later read operations on the object might return the results of the write operation.

exception.span: 参数中为 或 数据类型指定的值不是偶数。

span.span: A value specified in the parameter for a or data type is not even.
-or-

exception.span: 参数中指定的值小于零，或大于 4 GB。

span.span: A value specified in the parameter is less than zero or greater than 4 gigabytes.

exception.span: 该操作未处在事务中， 对象为 null，或者连接已关闭。

The object was closed or disposed.
An Oracle error has occurred.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于 数据类型， 将以类型为的连续数组返回整个基础数据 `Byte[]` 。For data types, returns the entire underlying data as a contiguous array of type `Byte[]`. 对于 和 数据类型， 将以数据类型的形式返回所有数据 `String` 。For and data types, returns all the data as a `String` data type. 对于空数据， 返回 。For null data, returns . 通过比较返回的值，可以区分空数据、空数据和数据。By comparing the returned values, you can distinguish among empty data, null data, and data. > [!NOTE] > 使用 `LOB` 数据类型的好处是能够在客户端上以区块形式检索大量数据。A benefit of using `LOB` data types is the capability to retrieve large amounts of data in chunks at the client. 但是，当你使用时，会将 列的所有数据 `LOB` 作为一个连续块获取，这可能会显著增加应用程序开销。However, when you use , you obtain all the data for the `LOB` column as one contiguous chunk, which can significantly increase application overhead.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void WriteByte(unsigned int8 value) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub WriteByte (value As Byte)

param.name: value
param.span: 要写入流中的字节。

span.span: The byte to write to the stream.

summary.span: 将一个字节写入 流内的当前位置，并将流内的位置向前推进一个字节。

span.span: Writes a byte to the current position in the stream, and advances the position within the stream by one byte.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果写入操作成功，则流中的位置将向前推进一个字节。If the write operation is successful, the position within the stream advances by one byte. 如果发生异常，则流中的位置将保持不变。If an exception occurs, the position within the stream remains unchanged. 允许写入超出末尾 `LOB` ，并将其放大 `LOB` 一个字节。Writing beyond the end of the `LOB` is allowed and enlarges the `LOB` by one byte. 若要写入 `LOB` ，您必须 `LOB` 使用 SQL SELECT 语句中的 FOR UPDATE 子句检索到，并且必须已启动本地事务。To write to the `LOB`, you must have retrieved the `LOB` using the FOR UPDATE clause in the SQL SELECT statement, and you must have a local transaction started. > [!NOTE] > 对只读的写入操作 `LOB` 可能会成功，但不会更新 `LOB` 服务器上的。A write operation to a read-only `LOB` might succeed, but does not update the `LOB` on the server. 但在这种情况下，将更新的本地副本 `LOB` 。In this case, however, the local copy of the `LOB` is updated. 因此，以后对对象的读取操作 可能会返回写入操作的结果。Therefore, later read operations on the object might return the results of the write operation.
